aiSuggestion.title: What are you in the mood to eat?

input.placeholder: Tell the chef what you're craving...

info.generic: Recommendations are based on the digital menu.

intro.suffix: I’ll help you find the perfect dish.

aiAssistantContent.noCreditsTitle: The AI assistant is currently unavailable

hero.heading: Smart technology for serious restaurateurs.
hero.subheading: Dazzle guests with rich storytelling around your signature dishes while the AI assistant reads their tastes, dietary needs, and mood to surface the perfect recommendation in seconds.

highlights.title: Delight guests and empower your team.

instantMenu.title: Instant Menu Updates
instantMenu.body: Publish seasonal dishes, sold-out items, or dynamic pricing in seconds without reprinting any paper menus.

aiConcierge.title: AI Concierge
aiConcierge.body: Help guests discover dishes through natural language questions and dietary filters powered by our AI assistant.

insights.title: Personalized AI Assistant
insights.body: Launch a custom AI agent in your brand voice that chats with guests, answers every question, and feeds you insights you can instantly turn into new offers.

blog.title: The Future of Smart Restaurant Menus

aiVsQr.title: Why AI-powered menus outperform static QR menus
aiVsQr.excerpt: Static QR menus only display dishes. Smart Menu actively guides guests with personalized recommendations, helping them decide faster and order more.

upsell.title: Turn indecision into higher average orders
upsell.excerpt: An AI assistant suggests dishes based on mood, dietary needs, and preferences — reducing hesitation and increasing upsells naturally.

contact.title: Ready to serve your guests?
contact.body: Tell us about your concept, audience, and challenges. We'll tailor a Smart Menu rollout that feels like a natural extension of your brand.
